LABEL: 0x2A2
STRING: The lobby was silent.

LABEL: 0x2C4
STRING: Everyone had long since finished eating, but...

LABEL: 0x362
STRING: 「...Sorry.」

LABEL: 0x382
STRING: 「I ended up saying something ominous.」

LABEL: 0x3B9
STRING: If you were going to say that, we shouldn't be telling ghost stories in the first place.

LABEL: 0x415
STRING: I accepted the pendant back from an apologetic Yukari.

LABEL: 0x44F
STRING: A silver medal with its lost writing; Dei Gratia.

LABEL: 0x4FF
STRING: As if by suggestion, the word "destiny" crossed my mind.

LABEL: 0x53C
STRING: If everything had been predetermined from the beginning, then no matter how hard we tried, it was all for naught, wasn't it?

LABEL: 0x5A2
STRING: In fact, it had all been pointless up until now.

LABEL: 0x5D8
STRING: How much was there left for us to do?

LABEL: 0x614
STRING: Did we... still have to struggle?

LABEL: 0x658
STRING: My thoughts drifted inward, down to the bottom of the sea.

LABEL: 0x686
STRING: Negative imagery was contagious, even if you didn't say anything out loud.

LABEL: 0x75E
STRING: Everyone gathered in the lobby was downcast, unable to say anything...

LABEL: 0x7AB
STRING: 「Okay!」

LABEL: 0x7C8
STRING: Hiragino stood up.

LABEL: 0x7EA
STRING: Naturally, everyone looked up at him.

LABEL: 0x87E
STRING: 「Well... it's getting late. It's time we get some rest.」

LABEL: 0x8BB
STRING: He smiled without a hint of embarrassment while making that awfully cheerful declaration.

LABEL: 0x8F9
STRING: 「But, we haven't made contact yet.」

LABEL: 0x929
STRING: 「We need their help as soon as possible. If we can get in touch with them tonight, maybe tomorrow morning――」

LABEL: 0x994
STRING: 「I understand your impatience.」

LABEL: 0xA1F
STRING: 「But look at it this way. If the reason for the lack of communication is up on the surface, then we have to wait for the situation there to improve.」

LABEL: 0xA8F
STRING: 「I'm not a professional mechanic or programmer, but if you've spent this much time on it and it's still not working,

LABEL: 0xB01
STRING: I don't think there's much more we can do.」

LABEL: 0xB3B
STRING: 「Or, do you have some reason to believe that you can restore communications?」

LABEL: 0xB92
STRING: 「Well...」

LABEL: 0xC29
STRING: I cast a sidelong glance at Reiri.

LABEL: 0xCA6
STRING: The girl who was supposed to know everything about this ship gave a small shake of her head.

LABEL: 0xD78
STRING: 「Even if there's nothing we can do right now, it might be restored tomorrow.」

LABEL: 0xDC6
STRING: 「Besides, even if the comms are restored in the middle of the night, the surface won't be able to come for us anyway.」

LABEL: 0xE18
STRING: 「It's better to sleep when you can than to expend energy needlessly.」

LABEL: 0xE67
STRING: Hiragino put his hand on my shoulder.

LABEL: 0xE9B
STRING: As the palm of his hand sunk in, I could feel my accumulated fatigue spreading through my whole body.

LABEL: 0xF10
STRING: 「Don't tell me you're not tired.」

LABEL: 0xF47
STRING: 「Yeah... I get it.」

LABEL: 0xF6B
STRING: 「Everyone, let's rest.」

LABEL: 0x1056
STRING: 「I'll take care of the clean up here.」

LABEL: 0x1088
STRING: 「Everyone, go to your rooms.」

LABEL: 0x10E9
STRING: Prompted by Yukari, everyone stood up from their seats.

LABEL: 0x1113
STRING: Touri helped Reiri get to her feet.

LABEL: 0x1218
STRING: 「Reiri seems to be having a hard time, so we'll go on ahead.」

LABEL: 0x1269
STRING: 「Okay, good night.」

LABEL: 0x12FB
STRING: 「Good night!」

LABEL: 0x1383
STRING: Reiri, who looked truly exhausted, left the lobby with Touri pulling her by the hand.

LABEL: 0x13E5
STRING: I guess it was fine to leave her to Touri...

LABEL: 0x141D
STRING: My moment's hesitation, however, quickly faded into oblivion.

LABEL: 0x14C9
STRING: 「Now then... Let's clean this up.」

LABEL: 0x14F6
STRING: 「Need some help?」

LABEL: 0x1523
STRING: 「No, you'd only be in the way.」

LABEL: 0x15CE
STRING: 「I'm just kidding. Washing dishes and the like calms me down.」

LABEL: 0x161D
STRING: I somewhat understood what the chuckling Yukari was getting at.

LABEL: 0x165F
STRING: If that was the case, I should leave it to her.

LABEL: 0x16B9
STRING: 「Hiragino-san, we should――」

LABEL: 0x16E3
STRING: The moment I turned around while calling out to him, I caught sight of something.

LABEL: 0x172E
STRING: 「Sousuke-san...」

LABEL: 0x175B
STRING: 「T-Tokiwa-kun...」

LABEL: 0x1840
STRING: Tokiwa was calling Hiragino's name with a serious and somewhat impatient look on her face.

LABEL: 0x1886
STRING: Hiragino looked puzzled in front of the girl looking up at her with moist eyes.

LABEL: 0x18C6
STRING: He was used to dealing with her joking around, but when faced with this serious version of Tokiwa, he was unable to say anything.

LABEL: 0x193C
STRING: Tokiwa was unsure if she should say something or not.

LABEL: 0x197E
STRING: She opened her small mouth in an uncharacteristically timid and reserved manner.

LABEL: 0x19D5
STRING: 「Sousuke-san. Um, you see... well...」

LABEL: 0x1A09
STRING: 「...Could I... go check on her?」

LABEL: 0x1D99
STRING: The emergency room, where Hikari was still asleep.

LABEL: 0x1DC1
STRING: Leaving Yukari in the lobby, Hiragino, Tokiwa, and I made our way there.

LABEL: 0x1E08
STRING: I wasn't sure if it was okay to get close to a virus-infected patient, even if they were close relatives...

LABEL: 0x1E60
STRING: They had been in separate rooms during the blood transfusion as well, so my hesitation was natural.

LABEL: 0x1EB4
STRING: However, Hiragino readily gave the okay.

LABEL: 0x1EE4
STRING: Tokiwa opened the door and rushed over to the sleeping Hikari and kneeled by her bed.

LABEL: 0x1FB9
STRING: 「...Rumi-chan.」

LABEL: 0x1FDE
STRING: She looked at the sleeping girl at close range with heartfelt concern.

LABEL: 0x201A
STRING: "Rumi-chan"...Come to think of it, when she was found covered in blood inside the pressurization room, Tokiwa had called her that back then as well.

LABEL: 0x2088
STRING: Hikari had referred to herself as Lumiere=Hikari... That wasn't her real name, of course.

LABEL: 0x20E8
STRING: Tokiwa, who had disappeared for seven years, and Hikari, who had been isolated at ROMLES as an <Alice>-carrier.

LABEL: 0x214A
STRING: I knew nothing about the sisters' relationship.

LABEL: 0x2195
STRING: Hikari was breathing quietly, and although she wasn't waking up, she looked to be simply asleep.

LABEL: 0x21FB
STRING: Her happy, beautiful, and unharmed face paradoxically reminded me of death.

LABEL: 0x233E
STRING: 「If I'm allowed to be selfish...」

LABEL: 0x237C
STRING: 「Would you mind leaving us alone for a while?」

LABEL: 0x23BE
STRING: Even if she was normally the living embodiment of noisiness,

LABEL: 0x2404
STRING: we couldn't help but nod before her quiet plea.

LABEL: 0x24E7
STRING: Hiragino and I stepped out into the hallway.

LABEL: 0x2522
STRING: We closed the door.

LABEL: 0x253C
STRING: When I looked at Hiragino, he pulled out a bunch of tablets from his pocket and stuffed them into his mouth.

LABEL: 0x25A4
STRING: ...Wouldn't that mess up your stomach?

LABEL: 0x25D4
STRING: Or were those some sort of weird drugs?

LABEL: 0x2614
STRING: The way he ate them with a crunching sound was bizarre.

LABEL: 0x265E
STRING: Was he stressed out or something...?

LABEL: 0x2974
STRING: 「...Hmm, right.」

LABEL: 0x29C6
STRING: As he was stretching outside the emergency room, Hiragino turned around and knocked on the door as if remembering something.

LABEL: 0x2A88
STRING: 「Tokiwa-kun, it's getting late.」

LABEL: 0x2AB0
STRING: 「You should finish up and go to sleep.」

LABEL: 0x2AED
STRING: ...There was no reply.

LABEL: 0x2B0B
STRING: She should be able to hear him inside the quiet room, no matter how sturdy the door was...

LABEL: 0x2C18
STRING: Hiragino slowly opened the door and stepped into the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x2C54
STRING: He opened the curtains that were covering the bed where Hikari was sleeping.

LABEL: 0x2C9E
STRING: On the bed, Hikari was asleep with a peaceful expression on her face.

LABEL: 0x2CDC
STRING: And there, just as before, was Tokiwa, frozen in a kneeling position.

LABEL: 0x2D1A
STRING: She was asleep while holding Hikari's left hand to her chest.

LABEL: 0x2D64
STRING: 「Hey, hey...」

LABEL: 0x2D82
STRING: She was awake just a few minutes ago. What the heck was going on?

LABEL: 0x2DC4
STRING: This was right after she told us to let her be alone with Hikari... it wouldn't make sense if she just wanted to sleep.

LABEL: 0x2E23
STRING: If that was the case, then she was acting selfish. But if it was a physiological phenomenon, then there was no helping it.

LABEL: 0x2E7B
STRING: 「...She must have been tired, too.」

LABEL: 0x2F17
STRING: 「Yeah. She must've been relieved that her sister is alive...」

LABEL: 0x2F62
STRING: Relieved, or...

LABEL: 0x2F7C
STRING: I wondered how she felt about the sudden appearance of her sister, whom she was never supposed to meet.

LABEL: 0x2FCC
STRING: She might have felt reassured now that she was alive, but her inner thoughts shouldn't be that simple.

LABEL: 0x3026
STRING: Now that she had fallen asleep, I'd missed my chance to ask what kind of relationship they had.

LABEL: 0x30AF
STRING: 「Well, what should we do with her?」

LABEL: 0x30DD
STRING: Tokiwa had fallen asleep in the blink of an eye.

LABEL: 0x310F
STRING: We couldn't just leave her here.

LABEL: 0x3147
STRING: Even if we decided to take her to my room, it wouldn't be the same as when I had carried Reiri.

LABEL: 0x3191
STRING: I didn't think I had the strength to carry her on my back...

LABEL: 0x3231
STRING: 「I'll let her sleep on the bed next to her.」

LABEL: 0x326E
STRING: 「Are you sure? She's infected with <Alice>...」

LABEL: 0x32B2
STRING: 「Even if you're here, don't you think that's too reckless?」

LABEL: 0x3380
STRING: 「Well...」

LABEL: 0x33A1
STRING: Hiragino hesitated for a moment.

LABEL: 0x33CF
STRING: He looked back and forth between the sleeping sisters and finally let out a sigh.

LABEL: 0x3489
STRING: 「I guess I should tell you.」

LABEL: 0x34C5
STRING: 「There's something I want you to see.」

LABEL: 0x350A
STRING: Saying that, Hiragino returned to his desk and booted up the PC.

LABEL: 0x3550
STRING: Displayed on the monitor was a diagram of several spiral structures.

LABEL: 0x35A8
STRING: The effect of <Alice> on genes... Given what we just talked about, was this――

LABEL: 0x3607
STRING: 「I did a DNA sequencing on Tokiwa-kun's blood.」

LABEL: 0x364C
STRING: 「And here... this is Hikari-kun's genome.」

LABEL: 0x3684
STRING: 「What came out... was this sequence.」

LABEL: 0x36B2
STRING: 「Judging by how similar they are, there's no doubt that they're sisters.」

LABEL: 0x36F5
STRING: The two spirals on the screen suddenly overlapped.

LABEL: 0x373C
STRING: Not that I had ever doubted it, but no one could argue that they weren't sisters after seeing this.

LABEL: 0x379F
STRING: The genetic information of the two was infinitely similar.

LABEL: 0x37D0
STRING: Hiragino zoomed in on a specific section and marked it.

LABEL: 0x387A
STRING: 「This is the area I want you to focus on.」

LABEL: 0x38B0
STRING: 「Clock, Bmal1, Period, Cry―it's a group known as the clock genes.」

LABEL: 0x3901
STRING: 「Most of them are missing in Hikari-kun's genome.」

LABEL: 0x394C
STRING: 「Is that because of <Alice>...?」

LABEL: 0x3987
STRING: 「Yeah. There's no doubt about it.」

LABEL: 0x39B8
STRING: Her clock genes were destroyed by <Alice>.

LABEL: 0x39EC
STRING: Seeing that cruel state of affairs left me speechless.

LABEL: 0x3A22
STRING: Hiragino then marked a different spot.

LABEL: 0x3ABE
STRING: 「And what's even more interesting is――」

LABEL: 0x3AE4
STRING: 「Here. Can you see it?」

LABEL: 0x3B0D
STRING: Hiragino marked a part of Tokiwa's genome―a completely normal sequence.

LABEL: 0x3B61
STRING: It was a random sequence made up of AGCT... I couldn't read any more information than that.

LABEL: 0x3C19
STRING: 「This sequence is unique to her――」

LABEL: 0x3C45
STRING: 「It's likely that this DNA sequence is from the <Alice> virus.」

LABEL: 0x3CB1
STRING: 「Why is there an <Alice>-derived sequence in Tokiwa's genes?」

LABEL: 0x3D08
STRING: 「It's not surprising.」

LABEL: 0x3D2A
STRING: 「You know about retroviruses, don't you?」

LABEL: 0x3D62
STRING: 「They're viruses with reverse transcriptase.」

LABEL: 0x3D94
STRING: 「To put it simply, they can synthesize DNA.」

LABEL: 0x3DCC
STRING: A virus that could synthesize DNA...

LABEL: 0x3DF9
STRING: Hiragino spoke eloquently as he stared at the monitor.

LABEL: 0x3E9F
STRING: 「Once information is written in your DNA, it's transcribed into RNA.」

LABEL: 0x3EDD
STRING: 「Then, that RNA information is translated to make proteins.」

LABEL: 0x3F2E
STRING: 「This flow of genetic information from DNA to RNA to protein production is called the "central dogma."」

LABEL: 0x3F9A
STRING: 「This rule could be called the central principle of biology.」

LABEL: 0x3FD0
STRING: 「However, it was discovered that there are exceptions to this central dogma.」

LABEL: 0x4025
STRING: 「Retroviruses...」

LABEL: 0x404F
STRING: Hiragino nodded.

LABEL: 0x4069
STRING: Genetic information was transmitted from DNA to RNA and then to proteins.

LABEL: 0x40AD
STRING: Nevertheless, a retrovirus that could synthesize DNA would truly be an exception to the central dogma.

LABEL: 0x4180
STRING: 「Retro means "reverse."」

LABEL: 0x41A7
STRING: 「Retroviruses, as the name implies, "reverse" the central dogma.」

LABEL: 0x41F7
STRING: 「They can make DNA out of RNA, in other words.」

LABEL: 0x4231
STRING: 「That's why retroviruses are so terrifying.」

LABEL: 0x4267
STRING: 「They can incorporate their own RNA information into the DNA... They can rewrite the genome of their host.」

LABEL: 0x42CA
STRING: Retroviruses that could rewrite the host's genome...

LABEL: 0x4304
STRING: They reversed the central dogma and, in the end, changed the flow itself...

LABEL: 0x4350
STRING: In other words, they would rewrite their host into a better living environment for themselves―an ultimate form of a parasite.

LABEL: 0x4420
STRING: 「Now then, when a foreign retrovirus enters the genome of a human reproductive cell...」

LABEL: 0x4478
STRING: 「That RNA information will be incorporated into the human genome.」

LABEL: 0x44B1
STRING: 「Eventually, it will be inherited as a part of that lineage's genome.」

LABEL: 0x44FD
STRING: 「Those that do are called "endogenous retroviruses" of retrovirus-derived genes.」

LABEL: 0x4559
STRING: 「Endogenous retroviruses are called viruses, but in essence, only the genetic information of the virus remains.」

LABEL: 0x45CF
STRING: 「In other words, a memory of an old virus has been incorporated into the genome in the form of a DNA sequence and passed down to the present.」

LABEL: 0x4647
STRING: 「Passed down... Of course.」

LABEL: 0x466F
STRING: 「It's a gene, after all.」

LABEL: 0x46A2
STRING: 「Yeah. The virus survives in the form of information.」

LABEL: 0x46DC
STRING: 「And then, it's passed down vertically from generation to generation, and it survives.」

LABEL: 0x4733
STRING: Information about a virus that lived in your genes was passed down through the generations.

LABEL: 0x4771
STRING: However, it was only information derived from the virus.

LABEL: 0x47B3
STRING: 「The original virus itself won't survive.」

LABEL: 0x47F5
STRING: 「Right?」

LABEL: 0x482A
STRING: 「Even so, it's fine as long as the information is still there.」

LABEL: 0x486C
STRING: 「In the first place... perhaps the essence of life is to preserve information for future generations.」

LABEL: 0x48C3
STRING: To be inherited―to be passed on.

LABEL: 0x48F3
STRING: Was all life just a temporary existence in order to connect information to the next generation?

LABEL: 0x4945
STRING: If that was true, then the essence of life was a genome that contained information...

LABEL: 0x4983
STRING: And, retroviruses implanted their own information there.

LABEL: 0x49D0
STRING: 「In addition to the genes that determine the structure of our bodies,

LABEL: 0x4A20
STRING: the human genome has far more retrovirus-derived sequences than that――」

LABEL: 0x4A76
STRING: 「According to one theory, nearly 50%% of the human genome comes from viruses.」

LABEL: 0x4AC9
STRING: 「In the first place, only 1.5%% of the genome is involved in proteins that make the human body.」

LABEL: 0x4B31
STRING: 「So, it's not strange that an <Alice>-derived sequence is incorporated into her genome.」

LABEL: 0x4B8F
STRING: 「But the question is... when did it happen?」

LABEL: 0x4BC5
STRING: 「One possibility is that she inherited it from her parents.」

LABEL: 0x4C09
STRING: 「And, another is――」

LABEL: 0x4C30
STRING: If she hadn't inherited it from her parents, there was another possibility.

LABEL: 0x4CF3
STRING: 「That Tokiwa was once infected with <Alice> as well――」

LABEL: 0x4D3C
STRING: 「That's right. And it was cured in some way. Remnants of it were left behind in her genome.」

LABEL: 0x4D94
STRING: 「...No, cured isn't the right word.」

LABEL: 0x4DCC
STRING: 「She still has <Alice> inside her body.」

LABEL: 0x4E04
STRING: 「They may have chosen a path of coexistence, in other words――」

LABEL: 0x4E6E
STRING: 「Well, it's just a theory. You may think of it as just my delusions.」

LABEL: 0x4EB5
STRING: He said that, but I didn't think it was actually impossible...

LABEL: 0x4EFF
STRING: That would mean that Tokiwa had been infected with <Alice> in the seven years she was gone...

LABEL: 0x4F5F
STRING: Tomorrow.

LABEL: 0x4F7D
STRING: I'd ask Tokiwa tomorrow.

LABEL: 0x4FA9
STRING: About what happened during those seven years of absence...

LABEL: 0x50D8
STRING: 「In any case, she already has antibodies against <Alice>...」

LABEL: 0x5181
STRING: 「So it's all right to let her sleep next to her.」

LABEL: 0x51DA
STRING: It made sense in theory, but it was difficult to understand sensibly.

LABEL: 0x527B
STRING: 「I know you're not convinced. There's no vaccine or cure for <Alice>.」

LABEL: 0x52CF
STRING: 「If we use reverse transcriptase inhibitors, we might be able to temporarily suppress the onset of the symptoms, but... we don't have those on this ship.」

LABEL: 0x5345
STRING: 「Besides, once it gets into your DNA, it's already too late.」

LABEL: 0x538D
STRING: 「No way...」

LABEL: 0x53A9
STRING: No vaccine or cure existed for <Alice>?

LABEL: 0x53E1
STRING: 「But Yukari said there was a cure somewhere on the <SHEEP III>――」

LABEL: 0x543D
STRING: 「There is no such thing... even on the surface.」

LABEL: 0x5475
STRING: 「First of all, <Alice> has yet to be successfully cultivated... Even when infected to human-derived cells, it dies right away.」

LABEL: 0x54F7
STRING: 「That's why research on cures and the like hasn't progressed much. I was involved in the research, so I know a lot about it.」

LABEL: 0x556B
STRING: 「I think Momoi is just mistaken about something――」

LABEL: 0x5644
STRING: At that moment, I heard something behind the door.

LABEL: 0x5678
STRING: 「What was that...?」

LABEL: 0x56A3
STRING: 「I'll go take a look.」

LABEL: 0x56C8
STRING: With that, Hiragino gallantly opened the door.

LABEL: 0x56FA
STRING: He glanced around the hallway and came back.

LABEL: 0x573F
STRING: 「There's no one there. Must've been my imagination.」

LABEL: 0x5770
STRING: Imagination, huh?

LABEL: 0x578C
STRING: When you were this nervous, even the slightest noise could make you think something was wrong.

LABEL: 0x57EF
STRING: 「Now... what were we talking about?」

LABEL: 0x5817
STRING: 「Right. You should be extremely careful about your contact with <Alice>.」

LABEL: 0x585F
STRING: 「"Why are you telling me this now?" I know what you're thinking. Tokiwa-kun is an exception.」

LABEL: 0x58B2
STRING: Hiragino then laid Tokiwa down on the bed next to Hikari.

LABEL: 0x58F0
STRING: She must have been completely exhausted... She didn't wake up at all while he carried her.

LABEL: 0x5958
STRING: With the sisters asleep, Hiragino and I were the only ones left in the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x5991
STRING: Hiragino stretched his tired shoulders.

LABEL: 0x59B7
STRING: Following yesterday's treatment of Reiri and today's treatment of Hikari...

LABEL: 0x59EB
STRING: Even if he was a skilled doctor, he was probably close to his limit.

LABEL: 0x5A33
STRING: But... there was one thing I had to confirm.

LABEL: 0x5A79
STRING: 「Hiragino-san.」

LABEL: 0x5A93
STRING: 「Can I ask you one thing?」

LABEL: 0x5B2B
STRING: 「What's up?」

LABEL: 0x5B4C
STRING: 「Yesterday, you said there was a possibility that someone else was still on this ship...」

LABEL: 0x5BA0
STRING: 「That's not true, is it?」

LABEL: 0x5C57
STRING: No reply.

LABEL: 0x5C71
STRING: However, his silence spoke more tacitly of his thoughts than any answer.

LABEL: 0x5CB9
STRING: Our objective had been to search for Reiri and Tokiwa, but as a result, we had explored the entirety of the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x5D22
STRING: After exploring every nook and cranny―there was no one there.

LABEL: 0x5D5C
STRING: And above all... he had left Hikari alone in the emergency room without hesitation during our meal.

LABEL: 0x5DCC
STRING: 「Since we didn't find anyone after all that searching, you had to reconsider that there was no one else but us here...」

LABEL: 0x5E36
STRING: 「If that's the case, I can still accept it, but...」

LABEL: 0x5E70
STRING: 「...You must have realized it yesterday, Hiragino-san.」

LABEL: 0x5EC0
STRING: 「That it was Touri who strangled Reiri.」

LABEL: 0x5F80
STRING: 「Yes.」

LABEL: 0x5F96
STRING: 「That's what I suspect.」

LABEL: 0x5FBF
STRING: So that was why he was trying not to leave the girls alone.

LABEL: 0x6007
STRING: Whenever Touri and Reiri tried to act together, he would casually try to stop them...

LABEL: 0x6088
STRING: 「The reason I made up this "someone" was to protect Touri-kun and Reiri-kun, just as you said.」

LABEL: 0x60EE
STRING: 「Intuitively, or perhaps based on the circumstances, there's no one else who could've attacked Reiri-kun.」

LABEL: 0x6150
STRING: 「But I didn't want to accuse her in public... Besides, I couldn't blame her when I hadn't even seen the crime scene.」

LABEL: 0x61CD
STRING: 「Why would Touri――」

LABEL: 0x6208
STRING: 「Yes, the problem is her motive.」

LABEL: 0x622C
STRING: 「At first, I suspected Munchausen syndrome by proxy.」

LABEL: 0x626D
STRING: Munchausen syndrome by proxy―fabricating injuries, illnesses, and so on to those close to you to draw sympathy.

LABEL: 0x62CF
STRING: Whenever Reiri, who lacked physical strength, was about to collapse, Touri, who took care of her, was indeed somewhat animated.

LABEL: 0x6333
STRING: The more pitiful Reiri was, the more Touri turned into "a kind older sister who bravely took care of her."

LABEL: 0x63A3
STRING: And to further scorn her sister, Touri had strangled Reiri――

LABEL: 0x63DF
STRING: 「It makes sense... I agree that the two of them are co-dependent.」

LABEL: 0x6429
STRING: 「Touri, in particular, seems to have "being Reiri's sister" at the core of her identity.」

LABEL: 0x6485
STRING: 「There may be a Munchausen-by-proxy mentality at work.」

LABEL: 0x64CD
STRING: 「But to be honest, I doubt that she would actually do anything to her.」

LABEL: 0x6585
STRING: 「I totally agree with you. There are too many strange things to assume that.」

LABEL: 0x65E3
STRING: 「I watched them all day, but...」

LABEL: 0x663B
STRING: 「Maybe they've had some terrible trauma, too.」

LABEL: 0x66E8
STRING: 「...Trauma from the "Fourth Day."」

LABEL: 0x671F
STRING: The Fourth Day――

LABEL: 0x6739
STRING: The Aqualine accident seven years ago.

LABEL: 0x6769
STRING: The day Hiragino, Touri, and Reiri were caught up in it, and Tokiwa disappeared.

LABEL: 0x67AF
STRING: They "too...?" Did that mean Hiragino had some trauma related to the "Fourth Day" as well...?

LABEL: 0x6834
STRING: 「What's wrong, Katagiri-kun?」

LABEL: 0x685D
STRING: 「Eh, ah, no... It's nothing.」

LABEL: 0x6889
STRING: I instinctively looked away from Hiragino's face.

LABEL: 0x68C1
STRING: That day, the moment we set sail, he was staring at the <Isle of Wind>.

LABEL: 0x6901
STRING: His face was somewhat grim and bitter as we dove beneath the large white windmills.

LABEL: 0x695B
STRING: 「That day――」

LABEL: 0x6977
STRING: What had happened?

LABEL: 0x6997
STRING: Since I wasn't there, I only knew about the tragedy through the press and numerical information.

LABEL: 0x69ED
STRING: The gruesomeness of it was spoken of in various contexts, so I thought I understood it well in my head.

LABEL: 0x6A47
STRING: But, what did those who were actually there think?

LABEL: 0x6A91
STRING: If I didn't know what actually happened there, I might never know what happened to Touri and Reiri.

LABEL: 0x6AFB
STRING: I wondered if Hiragino――

LABEL: 0x6BC7
STRING: 「I'm just talking to myself here.」

LABEL: 0x6BF5
STRING: 「...It's not much of a story, really.」

LABEL: 0x6CC2
STRING: With that, he began his tale.

LABEL: 0x6CEA
STRING: On the way home from an outing with his girlfriend, they were involved in an accident.

LABEL: 0x6D20
STRING: Hiragino rushed out to save the lives of the people on the burning bridge.

LABEL: 0x6DFA
STRING: As he talked, Hiragino suddenly pulled out a small device from his pocket.

LABEL: 0x6E44
STRING: It was the medical device that had been attached to the tips of Reiri's and Hikari's fingers.

LABEL: 0x6E7C
STRING: Was that a small vitality checker or something?

LABEL: 0x6F20
STRING: 「This is an electronic triage tag.」

LABEL: 0x6F53
STRING: 「Triage...」

LABEL: 0x6F82
STRING: 「What I did that day on the burning Aqualine was select lives using this――」

LABEL: 0x6FDC
STRING: 「I labeled lives and chose between who should be saved and who should be left to die.」

LABEL: 0x70B2
STRING: The basis of triaging was the idea

LABEL: 0x70E4
STRING: of rescuing the largest number of lives under the inequality of "life > limb > function > appearance."

LABEL: 0x7144
STRING: This required rescuing patients with the most serious conditions based on the degree of danger to their lives.

LABEL: 0x71AC
STRING: Therefore, using what was called a tag, people's injuries were divided into four levels.

LABEL: 0x7260
STRING: From "green," which could be treated with first aid, the level of urgency went to "yellow" and "red" as the severity of the injuries increased.

LABEL: 0x72CA
STRING: And finally, "black," where the person's injuries were the most severe, was equated with death even if they were still alive.

LABEL: 0x732C
STRING: No life-saving action would be taken for those tagged "black."

LABEL: 0x736C
STRING: Their resources would be better spent elsewhere than on a person whose life they might not be able to save.

LABEL: 0x73EB
STRING: 「She was... in layman's terms, in a terrible state.」

LABEL: 0x7427
STRING: 「Even though I, who was sitting right next to her, was perfectly fine. She really was just unlucky...」

LABEL: 0x748D
STRING: 「She should've been tagged "black."」

LABEL: 0x74B9
STRING: 「But, I really wanted to save her―save Miu, no matter what.」

LABEL: 0x74FF
STRING: 「So I――」

LABEL: 0x757D
STRING: It was an emergency.

LABEL: 0x7595
STRING: Medical practice in the midst of a raging firestorm.

LABEL: 0x75C1
STRING: No one was watching.

LABEL: 0x75DF
STRING: He might be able to save a dying loved one.

LABEL: 0x761D
STRING: He was the only one who could――

LABEL: 0x7658
STRING: 「I distorted it.」

LABEL: 0x767A
STRING: 「I knew that someone who should've been saved might die due to my actions,

LABEL: 0x76C2
STRING: and that I would force the sin of living on her, but...」

LABEL: 0x7704
STRING: 「...I couldn't kill her.」

LABEL: 0x77D0
STRING: If one lived, another one died.

LABEL: 0x77F8
STRING: That was the reality at a disaster site. Time and manpower were limited.

LABEL: 0x7834
STRING: It was like the plank of Carneades.

LABEL: 0x7860
STRING: If you pushed someone else out of the way at the right time and survived because of it, you couldn't be charged with a crime――

LABEL: 0x79CB
STRING: 「That's only if the person in question decides.」

LABEL: 0x79FD
STRING: 「I intervened in others' lives without permission...」

LABEL: 0x7A2D
STRING: 「...Using the privilege of being a medical professional.」

LABEL: 0x7A5D
STRING: 「"I will not weigh my patients against each other." ...It was nothing like the Hippocratic oath.」

LABEL: 0x7B12
STRING: 「I'm a failure as a doctor.」

LABEL: 0x7B35
STRING: Hiragino smiled sadly.

LABEL: 0x7B55
STRING: The saying that one was a human being before being a doctor was a beautiful expression.

LABEL: 0x7BB3
STRING: However, as long as you were in a position to perform medical treatment and handle human life, you were not allowed to be human――

LABEL: 0x7C19
STRING: A murder that no one could judge.

LABEL: 0x7C43
STRING: A sin that no one could forgive.

LABEL: 0x7C6B
STRING: ...Hiragino had treated Hikari and Reiri in a restricted environment like this submarine.

LABEL: 0x7CBD
STRING: His ability as a doctor should be impeccable, but to call himself a failure as a doctor was due to the events of that time――

LABEL: 0x7D29
STRING: Perhaps that was the reason why he left his normal medical practice and became this ship's doctor.

LABEL: 0x7D86
STRING: Eventually, Hiragino raised his head and looked into the distance.

LABEL: 0x7E2C
STRING: 「Many people died on this ship, too.」

LABEL: 0x7E86
STRING: 「I couldn't do anything for them.」

LABEL: 0x7F05
STRING: 「...So, how am I able to stay calm like this?」

LABEL: 0x7FE2
STRING: 「...In the end, it doesn't matter.」

LABEL: 0x801A
STRING: 「No matter what happened, they were lives I couldn't save.」

LABEL: 0x8058
STRING: 「I'm a sham as a doctor.」

LABEL: 0x807A
STRING: 「That's why I told her not to call me "sensei..."」

LABEL: 0x80C3
STRING: Hiragino didn't want to be called "sensei."

LABEL: 0x80F7
STRING: Despite that, Yukari stubbornly continued to do so.

LABEL: 0x812F
STRING: No matter how un-doctor-like he acted or camouflaged himself, she consistently treated Hiragino as one.

LABEL: 0x819D
STRING: She wouldn't let him escape from that responsibility.

LABEL: 0x81CD
STRING: From that dignity――

LABEL: 0x81EB
STRING: 「Sorry for making you talk about such painful things. But... I'm glad to hear it.」

LABEL: 0x822D
STRING: 「I... I'm not in a position to say anything, but...」

LABEL: 0x826B
STRING: 「I lost my sister so suddenly that I couldn't accept it.」

LABEL: 0x82C1
STRING: 「I tried to do something about it, and ended up causing an accident with the <SHEEP III>.」

LABEL: 0x833E
STRING: 「...But, that was all I could do.」

LABEL: 0x837A
STRING: 「Even if we had dived to the place where she'd died and I had gotten some clues,

LABEL: 0x83E6
STRING: I wouldn't have been able to do anything for her.」

LABEL: 0x8444
STRING: No matter how far I went, it was mere self-satisfaction.

LABEL: 0x8478
STRING: I had thought that it was for my sister's sake, but in the end, I could not save anyone.

LABEL: 0x84D2
STRING: I never thought about saving anyone in the first place.

LABEL: 0x8508
STRING: I only lived because I wanted to be saved myself.

LABEL: 0x8544
STRING: 「So, I can't blame you for being so selfish.」

LABEL: 0x8590
STRING: 「...I know you blame yourself.」

LABEL: 0x85C2
STRING: 「But to say you couldn't do anything is a lie.」

LABEL: 0x8600
STRING: 「Unlike me, you saved Reiri and Hikari. Touri was saved because of you, too.」

LABEL: 0x8662
STRING: 「Regardless of your past... No, I think it's because you're aware of the fact that you're a human being before being a doctor.」

LABEL: 0x86D2
STRING: 「Because you're like that, Hiragino-san, I feel like I can entrust my life to you without worry.」

LABEL: 0x8716
STRING: 「Sorry for being so one-sided, but I have a lot of respect for you.」

LABEL: 0x8758
STRING: It was out of character for me to say to his face that I respected him.

LABEL: 0x8796
STRING: But there were no lies or falsehoods in my feelings.

LABEL: 0x87C8
STRING: Hiragino looked straight at me as I tried to hide my embarrassment.

LABEL: 0x8814
STRING: No sooner had his eyes widened than his expression softened.

LABEL: 0x88C2
STRING: 「It's about time. You should get some rest, too.」

LABEL: 0x894F
STRING: 「...Thanks.」

LABEL: 0x89EF
STRING: I separated from Hiragino, who said he would stay the emergency room, and went back to my room alone.

LABEL: 0x8A92
STRING: It had been a long day.

LABEL: 0x8AB2
STRING: My eyes were stinging... Maybe it was because I was staring at that monitor for so long.

LABEL: 0x8B02
STRING: I looked out the window as I massaged my eyes.

LABEL: 0x8B60
STRING: Did a huge shadow pass by the window just now...?

LABEL: 0x8B98
STRING: I hurried over and took a peek.

LABEL: 0x8BC2
STRING: However, there was no longer anything there.

LABEL: 0x8BF6
STRING: Maybe I was just imagining things...

LABEL: 0x8C1A
STRING: I exhaled and faced the window again from point-blank range.

LABEL: 0x8CAD
STRING: Darkness as far as the eye could see...

LABEL: 0x8CDD
STRING: It was easy to forget that we were in the deep sea right now.

LABEL: 0x8D21
STRING: We were barely alive at the bottom of this dark sea.

LABEL: 0x8DBC
STRING: In the darkness, marine snow was silently raining down.

LABEL: 0x8DF6
STRING: Bioluminescence mingled with the slowly falling snow.

LABEL: 0x8E32
STRING: That must have been the light of <COOS>, as well.

LABEL: 0x8EBD
STRING: <COOS>―if it had a will of its own,

LABEL: 0x8EF9
STRING: then what the hell was it trying to achieve by controlling and incorporating all life into its own network?

LABEL: 0x8F73
STRING: There was no answer.

LABEL: 0x8F8F
STRING: Meaningless questions wriggled inside my head.

LABEL: 0x8FC3
STRING: No matter what I thought, nothing would change. This ship was still tethered to darkness.

LABEL: 0x900B
STRING: And so, the second night came to an end.
